programme.title: 44 Inch Chest
programme.desc: A man is shattered by his wife's infidelity. When his friends urge him to exact retribution, he wrestles with remorse, grief and self pity.

programme.title: Hyde Park on Hudson
programme.desc: Global affairs are juggled with the all-too-human side of one of history's iconic leaders Franklin D. Roosevelt as he hosts the English royals for an unforgettable weekend in upstate NY.

programme.title: McClaren
programme.desc: The story of Bruce McLaren, the New Zealander who showed the world that a man of humble beginnings could take on the elite of motor racing and win.

programme.title: The Iron Lady
programme.desc: One of the 20th century's most influential women, Margaret Thatcher smashed through barriers of gender and class to be heard in a male-dominated world.

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: A caving trip goes wrong, trapping a group of women. Stalked by bloodthirsty beasts and turning against each other, they must become as savage as the creatures hunting them.

programme.title: Starter For 10
programme.desc: Working-class kid, Brian struggles to make his way in an upper-class university. This bitter-sweet comedy is about loyalty, falling in love, and the difference between knowledge and wisdom.

programme.desc: Forced into slavery by the corrupt heir to the throne, Roman general Maximus becomes a gladiator. His prowess in the arena leads him to Rome, the Colosseum, and a showdown with the new emperor.

programme.desc: A secret agent is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called Chimera.

programme.desc: Thrill-seeking meteorologists are chasing the most destructive tornado in 50 years.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The orphanage where Jake and Elwood were raised will be sold unless the tax on the property is paid within days. The brothers decide to raise the money by putting their band back together.

programme.title: Top Secret!
programme.desc: In this rock 'n' roll spy spoof, an Elvis-like pop idol who becomes embroiled in intrigue on a tour of East Germany and falls in love with a French Resistance Fighter.

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: Join an African prince on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World, as it's time for him to find a princess.

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth host the biggest show on local public access TV. Now a sleazy network executive wants to produce a big-budget version. With the help of Wayne's girlfriend, they must battle to save the show.

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: You'll never guess who's going to have a baby. Watch as the maternal tables are turned forever when, after taking an experimental drug, a male scientist becomes pregnant.

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: A Special Operations veteran is now into peace, serenity and non-violence. But when Trautman is held by the Soviets and interrogated, the CIA can do nothing and Rambo must come to his aid.

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: Elaine discovers just how avid a hockey fan her boyfriend is. Meanwhile, George tells his girlfriend that he loves her.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: cocolashika (a guitarless trio getting lots of attention for their city-pop sound) and Utagokoro Rie (a singer whose J-pop covers led to major-label debut).

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-11.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: In Japan, sweet potatoes are often baked or turned into sweets. But they can also be used to generate electricity or protect from heat. We introduce the diverse ways in which they are used and sold.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Two herb farmers' cats live next door to each other. Their relationship is tense due to a past fight. At Takeya Kannonji Temple, the chief priest lives with four cats that always stay by his side.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Anime Manga Explosion
programme.desc: Join us for a look at bones, the anime studio known for stunning action and works like Gachiakuta and My Hero Academia FINAL SEASON. Charismatic animator Nakamura Yutaka also makes his TV debut.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: u & i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: US Influences.

programme.title: Documentary 360 - Neo-Japonism
programme.desc: Japanese design, known for its beauty and functionality, is highly regarded around the world. We explore the craftsmanship, the people who sustain it, and the philosophy at its core.

programme.title: Mt.Fuji's Climb to World Heritage
programme.desc: Mt. Fuji's bid for World Heritage faced formidable obstacles, including devastation that would shock any mountain climber. This is the story of Fuji's long climb to celebrated cultural treasure.

programme.title: Ramen Japan
programme.desc: Ultra-thin noodles and amber broth: the story of a people who overcame disaster and their favorite bowl of ramen.

programme.title: Anime Manga Explosion
programme.desc: Join us for a look at bones, the anime studio known for stunning action and works like Gachiakuta and My Hero Academia FINAL SEASON. Charismatic animator Nakamura Yutaka also makes his TV debut.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: u & i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: cocolashika (a guitarless trio getting lots of attention for their city-pop sound) and Utagokoro Rie (a singer whose J-pop covers led to major-label debut).

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-11.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Two herb farmers' cats live next door to each other. Their relationship is tense due to a past fight. At Takeya Kannonji Temple, the chief priest lives with four cats that always stay by his side.

programme.title: Empowering kids through song
programme.desc: A Brazilian woman living in Japan is trying to promote a music video she made for kids about sexual abuse while navigating the differences between the two cultures.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: Global warming has raised sea temperatures, increasing powerful typhoons worldwide. The program reports on their impacts and explores with experts the mechanisms and causes of their intensification.

programme.title: Propellers: Unwavering Rationality
programme.desc: Okayama / Hara Kenya (graphic designer) Hara visits a Japanese propeller maker with a 30% global market share, to discover the merit of finding an object's perfect shape, without compromise.

programme.title: BOSAI: Science that Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Massive logistics facilities underpin online retail, but their robust warehouse structures, state-of-the-art seismic isolation systems and other features make them suitable as evacuation sites too.
